p: In the bioreactor cultures, the qualitative composition of secondary metabolites was found to be the same as in the agar and suspension cultures: the presence of verbascoside, isoverbascoside, and phenolic acids (protocatechuic, chlorogenic, vanillic, caffeic, ferulic and rosmarinic acids) was confirmed. None of the analyzed iridoids or flavonoids were found in the biomass. The estimated compounds were not found in the analyzed extracts from media lyophilizates.
